EmptyProjectState.defaultMessage:
No projects created yet.
Click the 'Create New Project' button to get started.

ProjectError.fetchError: An error occurred while fetching the project list.

AccountCard.title: My Account
AccountCard.description: Information for the currently logged in user.

ApiKeyStatus.noApiKeyDescription: There is no API key currently set in the system. Generate a new key for external integrations.

ApiKeyDeleteButton.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete?
ApiKeyDeleteButton.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The API key will be permanently deleted.

ApiKeyDisplay.newKeyDescription: This is your newly generated API key. This key will not be shown again, so be sure to copy and store it in a safe place.

ImageList.noImagesInProject: This project does not have any images yet.

ImageUploadDialog.selectFileWarning: Please select a file to upload.
ImageUploadDialog.title: Upload New File
ImageUploadDialog.description: Select a file. For image files, you can choose transformation options.
ImageUploadDialog.nonImageFileInfo: This file will be uploaded as-is.

DeleteImageDialog.deleteError: An error occurred while deleting the file.
DeleteImageDialog.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete?
DeleteImageDialog.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The file will be permanently deleted.

DeleteProjectButton.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete?
DeleteProjectButton.confirmDescription: This will delete the project "{projectName}". This action cannot be undone. All files within the project will also be deleted.

CreateProjectForm.title: Create New Project
CreateProjectForm.description: Enter the name and description for your new project.
CreateProjectForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a brief description for your project.
CreateProjectForm.storageProviderDescription: Select the cloud storage to store your files.
CreateProjectForm.noProvidersAvailable: No storage providers available. Please check your environment variables.

StorageProvider.R2_description: Cloudflare R2 - S3 Compatible Object Storage

LogoutButton.networkErrorToastDescription: This might be a network or server issue.

LoginForm.title: Login
LoginForm.description: Enter your email and password to login.

ApiKeyManager.generateSuccessToast: New API key generated. Store it safely!
ApiKeyManager.cardDescription: Manage API keys for external service integration. Only one API key can be generated per system. If you lose your API key, you must generate a new one.

ApiDocsView.title: API Documentation
ApiDocsView.description: Explore the usage and endpoint information for the Leemage API. Authentication may be required to use the API.

FeaturesSection.item1Description: Efficiently manage images by grouping them into projects.
FeaturesSection.item2Description: Easily upload, delete, and modify file information through an intuitive interface.
FeaturesSection.item3Description: Provides functionality to automatically resize images and convert them to desired formats upon upload.
FeaturesSection.item4Description: Access the system through simple authentication.
FeaturesSection.item5Description: Manage images from external projects via API.

ProjectDetailsWidget.fetchErrorDescription: An error occurred while fetching project information.

EditProjectDialog.title: Edit Project
EditProjectDialog.description: Edit the project name and description.
EditProjectDialog.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a brief description for your project.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been moved.

TransformOptions.title: Transform Options
TransformOptions.sourceSizeDescription: Save the original image without processing.
TransformOptions.originalSizeDescription: Save the original image without processing.

FormatDescriptions.jpeg: Lossy compression, small file size, ideal for photos
FormatDescriptions.avif: Modern format, high compression, limited browser support
FormatDescriptions.webp: Google developed, good compression, wide browser support

LandingHero.subtitle: Multi-object storage file management opensource platform built on OCI Object Storage and Cloudflare R2.

SolutionsSection.title: Why Leemage?
SolutionsSection.subtitle: Solving the pain points of traditional file management
SolutionsSection.compare1Before: Uploading through server increases server load
SolutionsSection.compare1After: Zero server load with direct-to-storage presigned URL uploads
SolutionsSection.compare2Before: Separate service needed for image transformation
SolutionsSection.compare2After: Automatic resize and WebP/AVIF conversion on upload
SolutionsSection.compare3Before: Different APIs to learn for each storage provider
SolutionsSection.compare3After: Unified API for OCI and R2 management
SolutionsSection.compare4Before: Files scattered across locations, hard to manage
SolutionsSection.compare5Before: Commercial services cost money and are hard to customize
SolutionsSection.compare5After: Open source - free to use and fully customizable

LandingFeatures.title: Keep everything in one place
LandingFeatures.feature1Description: Support for OCI Object Storage, Cloudflare R2 and more
LandingFeatures.feature2Description: Automatic resize and WebP/AVIF format conversion
LandingFeatures.feature3Description: External integration with API key support

StorageUsageCard.title: Storage Usage
StorageUsageCard.description: View your storage usage across all providers.
StorageUsageCard.warningMessage: Storage usage is getting high. {remaining} remaining.

QuotaSettingDialog.title: Set Storage Quota
QuotaSettingDialog.invalidQuota: Please enter a valid positive number.
QuotaSettingDialog.ociFreeTier: OCI Object Storage offers 10 GB free (20 GB total, first 10 GB free)
QuotaSettingDialog.r2FreeTier: Cloudflare R2 offers 10 GB/month free storage

info.title: Leemage API
info.description: Leemage file management platform API. Manage files by project and provides image transformation features.

get.description: Retrieve a specific project and its files by project ID.

delete.description: Delete a specific project by project ID. All files in the project will also be deleted.

presign.description: Generate a presigned URL for file upload. Clients can use this URL to upload files directly to OCI.

confirm.description: Call after direct upload to OCI to create a file record in the database. For image files, you can request transformation processing with variants option.

delete.description: Delete a file with the specified ID and all related versions. (Including OCI storage)

presign.fileName: Name of the file to upload
presign.presignedUrl: Presigned URL for direct upload to OCI

confirm.variants: (Image only) Array of image variant options to generate
